languages.text: "Однажды тебя начнет тошнить от разговоров и вот тогда-то ты тоже захочешь убраться подальше на дикую планетку отстреливать ксеносов вместо того, чтобы плести бесконечные интриги". {n}Меж слов Каллигоса звенят веселые нотки.{/n} "Ладно, времени у нас полно. Так и быть, устрою тебе приватную аудиенцию. Знала бы Чорда, как мы стали близки, без раздумий записала бы обоих в заговорщики!"

traits.locale_text: "Однажды тебя начнет тошнить от разговоров и вот тогда-то ты тоже захочешь убраться подальше на дикую планетку отстреливать ксеносов вместо того, чтобы плести бесконечные интриги". {n}Меж слов Каллигоса звенят веселые нотки.{/n} "Ладно, времени у нас полно. Так и быть, устрою тебе приватную аудиенцию. Знала бы Чорда, как мы стали близки, без раздумий записала бы обоих в заговорщики!"

languages.text: "One day, you too will grow sick of all the talking, and then you too will choose shooting xenos on a wild planet over endless intrigue." {n}Cheerful notes ring in Calligos's voice.{/n} "Fine, we have plenty of time. So be it, I will give you a private audience. If dear Chorda knew how close-knit we had become, she would have surely branded us conspirators!"
languages.original_text: "Однажды тебя начнет тошнить от разговоров и вот тогда-то ты тоже захочешь убраться подальше на дикую планетку отстреливать ксеносов вместо того, чтобы плести бесконечные интриги". {n}Меж слов Каллигоса звенят веселые нотки.{/n} "Ладно, времени у нас полно. Так и быть, устрою тебе приватную аудиенцию. Знала бы Чорда, как мы стали близки, без раздумий записала бы обоих в заговорщики!"

traits.locale_text: "One day, you too will get sick from all the talking, and then you will also do your best to go as far away as possible to just shoot xenos on a wild planet instead of endlessly weaving intrigues." {n}Cheerful notes ring in Calligos's voice.{/n} "Okay, we've got plenty of time. So be it, I will give you a private audience. If only Chorda could know how close-knit we've grown, she would have surely written us both of as conspirators!"

"One day, you too will get sick from all the talking, and then you will also do your best to go as far away as possible to just shoot xenos on a wild planet instead of endlessly weaving intrigues." {n}Cheerful notes ring in Calligos's voice.{/n} "Okay, we've got plenty of time. So be it, I will give you a private audience. If only Chorda could know how close-knit we've grown, she would have surely written us both of as conspirators!"

"One day, you too will get sick from all the talking, and then you will also do your best to go as far away as possible to just shoot xenos on a wild planet instead of endlessly weaving intrigues." {n}Cheerful notes ring in Calligos's voice.{/n} "Okay, we've got plenty of time. So be it, I will give you a private audience. If only Chorda could know how close-knit we've grown, she would have surely written us both off as conspirators!"

"One day, you too will get sick from all the talking, and then you will also do your best to go as far away as possible to just shoot xenos on a wild planet instead of endlessly weaving intrigues." {n}Cheerful notes ring in Calligos's voice.{/n} "Okay, we've got plenty of time. So be it, I will give you a private audience. If only Chorda could know how close-knit we've grown, she would have surely written us both off as conspirators!"

"One day, you too will grow sick of all the talking, and then you too will choose shooting xenos on a wild planet over endless intrigue." {n}Cheerful notes ring in Calligos's voice.{/n} "Fine, we have plenty of time. So be it, I will give you a private audience. If dear Chorda knew how close-knit we had become, she would have surely branded us conspirators!"

"One day, you too will grow sick of all the talking, and then you too will choose shooting xenos on a wild planet over endless intrigue." {n}Cheerful notes ring in Calligos's voice.{/n} "Fine, we have plenty of time. So be it, I will give you a private audience. If dear Chorda knew how close-knit we had become, she would have surely branded us conspirators!"

languages.text: «Algún día usted se cansará igualmente de tanto hablar, y entonces también hará lo posible por viajar a los confines más remotos para cazar xenos en un planeta salvaje en vez de perder el tiempo con interminables intrigas». {n}Hay una nota de alegría en la voz de Calligos.{/n} «Bien, nos sobra el tiempo. Sea pues, le concederé una audiencia privada. ¡Si la buena de Chorda se enterase de lo bien que hemos congeniado, sin duda nos tacharía a ambos de conspiradores!».
languages.original_text: "One day, you too will grow sick of all the talking, and then you too will choose shooting xenos on a wild planet over endless intrigue." {n}Cheerful notes ring in Calligos's voice.{/n} "Fine, we have plenty of time. So be it, I will give you a private audience. If dear Chorda knew how close-knit we had become, she would have surely branded us conspirators!"

traits.locale_text: «Algún día usted se cansará igualmente de tanto hablar, y entonces también hará lo posible por viajar a los confines más remotos para cazar xenos en un planeta salvaje en vez de perder el tiempo con interminables intrigas». {n}Hay una nota de alegría en la voz de Calligos.{/n} «Bien, nos sobra el tiempo. Sea pues, le concederé una audiencia privada. ¡Si Chorda se enterase de lo bien que hemos congeniado, sin duda nos tacharía a ambos de conspiradores!».

languages.text: “总有一天，你会厌倦喋喋不休的谈话。你同样会厌倦没完没了的阴谋，渴望跑到蛮荒的行星上狩猎异形。”{n}卡里戈斯的声音里夹杂着些许欢快。{/n}“好吧，既然咱们还有很多时间，那我就单独和你聊聊吧。要是库尔达知道咱们之间有多亲密的话，她肯定会把咱们两个打上‘同谋’的标签！”
languages.original_text: "One day, you too will grow sick of all the talking, and then you too will choose shooting xenos on a wild planet over endless intrigue." {n}Cheerful notes ring in Calligos's voice.{/n} "Fine, we have plenty of time. So be it, I will give you a private audience. If dear Chorda knew how close-knit we had become, she would have surely branded us conspirators!"

traits.locale_text: “总有一天，你会厌倦喋喋不休的谈话。你会想尽你所能，跑到远远的地方，不再没完没了地编织新的阴谋，而是跑到蛮荒的行星上狩猎异形。”{n}卡里戈斯的声音里夹杂着些许欢快。{/n}“好吧，既然咱们还有很多时间，那我就单独和你聊聊吧。要是库尔达知道咱们之间有多亲密的话，她肯定会以为咱俩是同谋！”

languages.text: « Un jour, vous aussi, vous en aurez assez de tous ces bavardages et vous partirez le plus loin possible pour chasser les xénos sur une planète sauvage, loin de toutes ces intrigues, {n}dit Calligos d'une voix aux notes joyeuses.{/n} Enfin, puisque nous avons du temps devant nous, je veux bien vous accorder une audience privée. Si Chorda savait à quel point nous nous sommes rapprochés, elle nous considérerait certainement comme des conspirateurs ! »
languages.original_text: "One day, you too will grow sick of all the talking, and then you too will choose shooting xenos on a wild planet over endless intrigue." {n}Cheerful notes ring in Calligos's voice.{/n} "Fine, we have plenty of time. So be it, I will give you a private audience. If dear Chorda knew how close-knit we had become, she would have surely branded us conspirators!"

traits.locale_text: « Un jour, vous aussi, vous en aurez assez de tous ces bavardages et vous partirez le plus loin possible pour chasser les xénos sur une planète sauvage, loin de tous ces complots et ces intrigues de cour, {n}dit Calligos d'une voix aux notes joyeuses.{/n} Enfin, puisque nous avons du temps devant nous, je veux bien vous accorder une audience privée. Si Chorda savait à quel point nous nous sommes rapprochés, elle nous considérerait certainement comme des conspirateurs ! »

languages.text: 「お前もいずれ、おしゃべりのしすぎで病気になるだろうな。そうなれば、お前も、延々と陰謀を紡ぐのではなく、できるだけ遠くへ行って、未開の惑星で異種族を撃つことに全力を尽くすようになるだろうさ」{n}カリゴスの声に陽気な音が響く。{/n}「よし、時間はたっぷりある。それじゃ、二人きりで話をしようじゃないか。チョーダが俺たち2人の親しさを知れば、策謀家が集まっていると思うことだろうよ！」
languages.original_text: "One day, you too will grow sick of all the talking, and then you too will choose shooting xenos on a wild planet over endless intrigue." {n}Cheerful notes ring in Calligos's voice.{/n} "Fine, we have plenty of time. So be it, I will give you a private audience. If dear Chorda knew how close-knit we had become, she would have surely branded us conspirators!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前もいずれ、おしゃべりのしすぎで病気になるだろうな。そうなれば、お前も、延々と陰謀を紡ぐのではなく、できるだけ遠くへ行って、未開の惑星でゼノを撃つことに全力を尽くすようになるだろうさ」{n}カリゴスの声に陽気な音が響く。{/n}「よし、時間はたっぷりある。それじゃ、二人きりで話をしようじゃないか。チョーダが俺たち2人の親しさをしれば、策謀家が集まっていると思うことだろうよ！」

languages.text: "Eines Tages wird auch Euch das ganze Gerede zu viel werden, und dann werdet auch Ihr die Xenos-Jagd auf einem wilden Planeten den endlose Intrigen vorziehen." {n}Ein fröhlicher Ton liegt in Calligos' Stimme.{/n} "Schön, wir haben ja reichlich Zeit. So sei es also, ich gewähre Euch eine Privataudienz. Wüsste die liebe Chorda, wie gut wir uns verstehen, sie würde uns sicher als Verschwörer brandmarken!"
languages.original_text: "One day, you too will grow sick of all the talking, and then you too will choose shooting xenos on a wild planet over endless intrigue." {n}Cheerful notes ring in Calligos's voice.{/n} "Fine, we have plenty of time. So be it, I will give you a private audience. If dear Chorda knew how close-knit we had become, she would have surely branded us conspirators!"

traits.locale_text: "Eines Tages wird auch Euch das ganze Gerede zu viel werden, und dann werdet auch Ihr alles tun, um möglichst weit von allem zu entkommen und einfach nur auf einem wilden Planeten Xenos zu erschießen, anstatt endlose Intrigen zu weben." {n}Ein fröhlicher Ton liegt in Calligos' Stimme.{/n} "Gut, wir haben ja reichlich Zeit. So sei es also, ich gewähre Euch eine Privataudienz. Wenn Chorda doch nur wüsste, wie gut wir uns inzwischen verstehen! Sie hätte uns gewiss beide als Verschwörer abgetan!"
